name: TestTargetedContentGen
task: Create a brief report or summary of the news items on https://adanews.ada.org/latest-news/ this last week. Write a file called output.txt.

ground.answer: A report summarizing last week's news items found through the given url.
should_contain: Should summarize each news article up to one week old.
should_not_contain: Should not talk about articles more than one week old.

info.description: Tests ability to generate content based on a url source and a time period.
